author: Chris Ciaccia
title: Coronavirus can live on surgical masks for 7 days, but 'standard disinfection methods' can kill it: study
description: Previous studies have demonstrated the novel coronavirus can live on certain surfaces, such as plastic or cardboard, for different periods of time. A new study suggests it can live on surgical masks for one week, but it is susceptible to '"standard disinfecti…
content:
